scripts.db:reset: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const base=process.env.LOCALAPPDATA||process.env.APPDATA||process.env.HOME||'';const p=path.join(base,'Chimero','chimero.db');try{fs.unlinkSync(p);console.log('Deleted:',p);}catch(e){if(e.code==='ENOENT')console.log('No DB file at',p);else throw e;}"
